name: Malefic Paradigm Dragon
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 "Malefic" monster from your Extra Deck while "Malefic Paradigm Dragon" is not on the field. If "Malefic World" is not on the field, destroy this card. Once per turn: You can send 1 "Malefic" card from your Deck to the GY; you can only attack with "Malefic" monsters for the rest of this turn, also return 1 of your banished Level 8 Synchro Monsters to the Extra Deck, then you can Special Summon that monster from your Extra Deck.
